text: Noel John Francisco (born August 21, 1969) is an American attorney and the 47th Solicitor General of the United States from September 19, 2017, to July 3, 2020. He served as Principal Deputy Solicitor General of the United States. Francisco was nominated to be Solicitor General of the United States in the Donald Trump administration in March 2017. He was confirmed by the U.S. Senate by a vote of 50-47 on September 19, 2017. He took office the same day. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at the United States Department of Justice website (updated February 3, 2017) Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:United States Solicitors General Category:Politicians from Syracuse, New York Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Noel Francisco
